All Pages contained within the Home tab are to facilitate an overview of Incidents within the environment.
Mitre Attack Overview - This dashboard is populated from the Analyst Annotation Maker. The Dashboard is an overview of where incidents are follwoing the Mitre Attack Framework

Network Map - This dashboard is populated from NMAP scans and in future examples also from ACAS scans. These scans have been uploaded as Lookup files for as examples for quick visualization techniques. This dashboard requires the Network Diagram Viz app to work.

Case Incident Network Visualization - This dashboard is supposed to populate from the Analyst Annotation Maker and represent specific incidents in visual context for clarity. This dashboard currently does not function. This dashboard requires the Network Diagram Viz app to work.
Analyst Annotation Maker- This Dashboard can be utilized to demonstrate incidents from all analysts involved from one location. This Dashboard populates the Mitre Attack Overview.
Analyst Annotation Viewss submissions from Annotation Maker dashboard

The most important factor for this app to work correctly is setting the `OPORD` marco to the index used. This affects all dashboards and datamodels used.

panel.title: Required app status (needs requirements csv in order to run)

search.query: | inputlookup requirements.csv | eval tag="csv" | append [| rest /services/apps/local | search disabled=0 label="Microsoft Sysmon Add-on" OR label="Lookup Editor" OR label="Splunk Add-on for Microsoft Windows" OR label="Palo Alto Networks Add-on" OR label="Splunk Stream" OR label="TA-Suricata" OR label="Splunk Add-on for Zeek aka Bro" OR label="Tenable Add-On for Splunk" OR label="Tenable App for Splunk" OR label="Splunk Common Information Model" OR label="Splunk Datasets Add-On" | eval tag="rest" ] | stats count(eval(tag=="csv")) as csv count(eval(tag=="rest")) as rest list(required) as required by label | eval status=if((rest>0), "Installed", "Missing") | rename label as app | table app status

panel.title: Inputlookup CSV files created/installed - without searches/dashboards will not work

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/-/data/lookup-table-files | search eai:appName=Arc_reactor_app title IN (analyst_annotations.csv, ja3-user_agents.csv, mitre_attack_framework.csv, network_map.csv, requirements.csv ) | rex field=title mode=sed "s/Arc_reactor_app_//g" | rex field=title mode=sed "s/.csv//g" | eval tag="csv" | stats count(eval(tag=="csv")) as csv count(eval(tag=="rest")) as rest list(required) as required by title | eval status=if((csv>0), "Installed", "Missing") | table title status

panel.title: Macro's - make sure the indexes are set properly

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/Arc_reactor_app/configs/conf-macros | search eai:acl.app=Arc_reactor_app | table title definition

table.title: All accelerated data models in your environment and their status

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/-/data//models | search eai:acl.app=Arc_reactor_app | table title acceleration acceleration.allow_old_summaries updated
